description: Corrected bass line (to improve both playability, remove incorrect "let-ring" notes) and named instruments.  Most of the changes in the bass line aren't visible in Songsterr, but mess up the sheet when opened in GuitarPro
title: Tempus Fugit

description: Changed Bass from Fingered to Picked and changed Bass fingering to minimize hand movement and open strings in fast sections. Inspection of the video for this song on Youtube shows that Chris Squire plays with a pick and minimizes hand movement especially during the "signature" riff.
title: Tempus Fugit
